author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Putprop ‍Acquires Further 7.75 Pct Stake In Pilot Peridot​
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Putprop Ltd:
* ‍ACQUISITION OF A FURTHER 7.75% OF PILOT PERIDOT​ * ACQUIRES STAKE IN ‍PILOT PERIDOT​ FROM JDC PROPERTY INVESTMENTS AND BOKSPITS INVESTMENTS FOR CONSIDERATION OF R14.6 MILLION
* ‍PUTPROP’S TOTAL SHAREHOLDING IN PILOT PERIDOT HAS INCREASED TO 61.21%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
